RadioButton.android:text: a) Rank of A = n if and only if determinant of A =0
b) Rank of A \u003C n if and only if determinant A ≠ 0
c) Rank of A \u003C n if A is invertible
d) Rank of A \u003C n if and only if the rows of A are linearly dependent

a) The L1 cache is always faster than L2 cache.
b) The L2 cache is used to mitigate the dynamic slowdown every time a L1 cache miss occurs.

d) In modern day computer, L2 cache is considered as initernal cache.
